metadata.title: CVE-2024-50056 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  usb: gadget: uvc: Fix ERR_PTR dereference in uvc_v4l2.c  Fix potential dereferencing of ERR_PTR() in find_format_by_pix() and uvc_v4l2_enum_format().  Fix the following smatch errors:  drivers/usb/gadget/function/uvc_v4l2.c:124 find_format_by_pix() error: 'fmtdesc' dereferencing possible ERR_PTR()  drivers/usb/gadget/function/uvc_v4l2.c:392 uvc_v4l2_enum_format() error: 'fmtdesc' dereferencing possible ERR_PTR()  Also, fix similar issue in uvc_v4l2_try_format() for potential dereferencing of ERR_PTR().
